__e: I still love you very much, and I miss you like crazy.
It was going really good, and it was cute, and it was sweet, but for one person, the extra-large cheap bottle of wine that she came home with was probably not the best thing for her.
And... it isn't because I was lucky enough to have a second family that I forgot my first, the family I cherish so.
- Look, I am so sorry, but
I'm awfully sorry about this, but you see, you must have been a little too close to the door when Willard opened it.
I'm terribly sorry for coming by so late, But there's someone who desperately needs you,
